msbt.message: One of my favorite things to do is to relax at home and sip a nice, hot beverage. I thought I might send something to help you do the same. Now your home can feel like a café! I hope you enjoy it as much as I do.

Even if you've already got a clock, I thought you might like another. I like to keep two clocks around, myself. It gives me peace of mind, since at least one is bound to keep telling time even if the other stops.

I can't resist buying anything that makes my home feel like a library. The problem is that sometimes I'll mess up and buy things I already own. Would you be willing to take this so I don't have to feel silly?

I saw something in the store that I liked, but I thought it would look so much better on you. I went ahead and bought this because I want to see if I'm right. If you do like it, I'd love to have you model it for me.

I'm obsessed with cooking, so I'm picky about what I keep around to cook with. I recently did a bit of a kitchen update, and wondered if this was something you could use? I hope you love it as much as I did.
